entry.title: A week of husband lunch boxes #42 my daughter started school🧒🏻 / creamy oyster spaghetti

media:group.media:title: A week of husband lunch boxes #42 my daughter started school🧒🏻 / creamy oyster spaghetti
media:group.media:description:
Husbentos & my daughter's bentos for school
【 Timestamp 】 00:03 🍱Tuesday / Tuna cheese nugget, chicken cold glass noodles salad, salted rice ball
( grocery & marinade oyster in oil)
07:46 🍱Wednesday / American dog, boiled corn, Zucchini
13:14 🍱Thursday / strawberry jam sandwich, egg sandwich, teriyaki chicken, boiled broccoli
( Husband solo dinner ) wafu creamy oyster pasta
21:47 🍱Friday / teriyaki balsamic meet roll, tamagoyaki, seasoned salmon, pollack roe
25:04 🍱Saturday / mixed vegetables and chicken fried rice
( Sunday family dinner & hair cut by husband ) shin ramyun
★Hello it's Imamu! Thank you for watching the video!!! and also always appreciate your comment☆ Have a nice weekend～(*ﾟ∀ﾟ*)
[ My Instagram account ] https://www.instagram.com/imamu__room/ Please forgive my poor English
[ Tools I use ] ★Frying pan ( wood handle) 26cm https://amzn.to/3eoALHs ★Tempura deep frying pan https://amzn.to/35fmXYa ★Tamagoyakipan Small size (玉子焼き小) https://amzn.to/3736Ptf (Amazon credit / I use Amazon Japan associate )
☆The name of the small pan Lodge 8-Inch Pre-Seasoned Cast-Iron Skillet

entry.title: 【A week of husband lunch boxes】#38🎐Japanese summer cold noodles

media:group.media:title: 【A week of husband lunch boxes】#38🎐Japanese summer cold noodles
media:group.media:description:
Thank you for watching and leaving a sweet comment always(*´▽｀*)
Sorry that was a typo, the subtitle of the picture on Friday and Saturday!!
🍱 Tuesday / seasoned bittermelon tempura, pork wrapped tofu steak, umeboshi (pickled plum)
Wednesday / flaked salmon, rapini with tsuyu sauce, fried sausage & bitter melon
Thursday / shabu shabu Japanese cold noodles with sesame miso sauce
Friday / sobameshi (yakisoba noodles×fried rice) with kimchi, prawn and rapini salad Smile potato
Saturday / rice ball with mentaiko(seasoned pollack roe) & mayo paste, smile potatoes, boiled broccoli, tamagoyaki

entry.title: 【A week of husband lunch boxes】#37 back to real life🏡

media:group.media:title: 【A week of husband lunch boxes】#37 back to real life🏡
media:group.media:description:
*update [ Honey Cherry syrup recipe ] 1 pack cherry 200g honey 1 Tbsp lemon juice
1, Put cherry and honey in the pot
2, Simmer for about 15 min ( gently mix to keep the shape)
3, let it cool down over the night in the fridge and done☆
Thank you for watching and leaving a sweet comment always(*´▽｀*)

media:group.media:title: 【A week of husband lunch boxes】#36 | Pork miso soup | Dokinchan
media:group.media:description:
*Sorry that was a typo 06:43. The seasoning is actually sake, mirin, soy sauce and sugar. Thank you !!
⏰Timestamp🍱 00:03 Tuesday / pork & green onion fried rolls, Mayo & oyster sauce broccoli salad, Furikake 04:30 Wednesday / Corn fried rice, marinated beef [ pepper lunch bento ] 08:00 Thursday / 👝Grocery haul 🏡Dinner / fried saury, pork & veggie miso soup[Tonjiru], okura salad 🧔🏻‍♀️Huswashing time 17:18 Friday / cheese, potato, pork rolls, tamagoyaki, cabbage salad, fried parsley 21:33 Saturday / mayo & miso salmon, umeboshi rice seasoning
[ Tools ] ☆Tempura deep - frying pan.... https://amzn.to/35fmXYa
☆ Tamagoyakipan... Small size (玉子焼き小) https://amzn.to/3736Ptf
( Amazon credit / I use Amazon associate )
[ About bento lunch box ] [ Does my husband heat the bento or eat it cold? ] He eats the bento at room temperature. That is natural things for us. but I know many people (also Japanese) wanna heat it. so I recommend you to use the lunch box that is fine for microwave, if you wanna heat it ;)
[ My Instagram account ] https://www.instagram.com/imamu__room/ Please forgive my poor English.
